column4: here is what happens when i try to open the synaptic : Child terminated with 1 status... it won't open
you sure you don't have a session open already?
where should that be?
you probably have an open synaptic window already
all i have opened is this X-chat and AIM talking to my girlfriend
ok, full error again please?
ok, and you entered *your* password?
ah, there you go
i think you need to add yourself to the sudoers file
read the wiki page i sent you
i can't even add a new user it gives me the same error... looks like i have an account problem in here :S
well, i'm pretty certain that's what you need to do....do it with a user who already has sudo privileges.
doesn't the wik tell you?
yup and everytime i try any of the commands in there i get the same thing : dgimusique is not in the sudoers file.
weird....if you're the only user, you should be able to sudo
i even tried logging out and loggin back in
ok, to double check, you did the 'adding users' step on the wiki page?
it tells me i'm not in the sudoers file even when i try that
logout, then iirc, you can log in as root using the username 'root' or 'rootuser' and the root password you set
then try adding yourself
i tried everything you told me... there is no way i can login into root... it tells me i'm not allowed to login as admin at the login screen
